src:
Iwan Bule: Pengganti Simon McMenemy antara Luis Milla atau Shin Tae-yong
06 Nov 2019, 17:36 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan tergoda dengan kapasitas Luis Milla dan Shin Tae-yong. Keduanya adalah kandidat pengganti Simon McMenemy di Timnas Indonesia.
Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu telah memastikan memberhentikan Simon dari kursi pelatih Timnas Indonesia. Kontrak Simon akan diputus dengan PSSI membayarkan kompensasinya.
Nama Milla muncul lantaran dia pernah menukangi Timnas Indonesia periode 2017-2018. Sedangkan Tae-Yong, adalah pelatih Timnas Korea Selatan di Piala Dunia 2018.
"Kandidatnya Shin Tae-yong dan Milla. Nanti kedua memaparkan kepada kami sehingga mengerucut ke satu nama," ujar Iwan Bule di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11).
"Tapi, akan ada nama-nama lain yang masuk ke kami dan kami akan melihatnya. Kalau sudah jadi, pelatih pengganti Simon baru bisa melatih pada akhir November 2019," katanya menambahkan.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Iwan Bule: Substitute Simon McMenemy between Luis Milla or Shin Tae-yong
Nov 6 2019, 17:36 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI Chairperson Mochamad Iriawan was tempted by the capacities of Luis Milla and Shin Tae-yong. Both are substitute candidates for Simon McMenemy in the Indonesian national team.
The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule has ensured dismissing Simon from the Indonesian national team coach seat. Simon's contract will be terminated with PSSI paying the compensation.
Milla's name appeared because she had coached the Indonesian national team for the 2017-2018 period. Meanwhile, Tae-Yong, is the coach of the South Korean national team at the 2018 World Cup.
"Candidates are Shin Tae-yong and Milla. Later the second exposes us to cone to one name," said Iwan Bule at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11).
"But, there will be other names that come to us and we will see it. If it has become, substitute coach Simon can only train at the end of November 2019," he added.

Read the next page, Bolaneters.
